hobbies.read: Read some books like fantasy or science-fiction

code.title: Developement
code.text: Build an application from front-end to back-end, with API. Always look back at what has been coded to see if it can be improved, comments and refactoring allow to always improve the code.

web-design.title: Responsive & design
web-design.text: The front-end is the basis for mastering the integration of a model, either with a CSS framework or by hand, with mobile-first development.

server.title: Deployments
server.text: Deploy projects on VPS servers, in HTTPS, HTTP 2 on NGINX with databases are often in MySQL.

experiments.title: Experiments
experiments.text: See what's new on the technologies I like and test them, then implement them in new projects.

seo.title: SEO
seo.text: Whether it's setting up <head> metadata, open graph, redirects, traffic analysis or ecodesign, SEO is important in every project.

documentation.title: Technical documentation
documentation.text: Write technical documentation to explain how to use some projects, to save snippets, to write some articles for developers.

bookshelves.subtitle: Web app to manage eBooks and comics
bookshelves.excerpt: Manage eBooks and comics with a web app, can parse EPUB, CBX and PDF. You can use filters, search, download, webreader and OPDS.
bookshelves.description: Manage eBooks and comics with a web app, can parse EPUB, CBX and PDF. You can use filters, search, download, webreader and OPDS.

psychology-bachelor.title: Psychology bachelor
psychology-bachelor.abstract: A background in psychology with a focus on child and adolescent development.

web-and-mobile-developer.title: Web & mobile developer
web-and-mobile-developer.abstract: A high quality training, launched within the framework of the “grande école du numérique”, which allows to train in 8 months to the basics and to some advanced notions of web development.

poec-java.title: POEC Java
poec-java.abstract: Three months intensive on Java to understand the basics up to recent frameworks like Spring.

developer-designer-of-applications.title: Developer Designer of Applications
developer-designer-of-applications.abstract: A vocational studies, 25% of the time per month at the ENI school and 75% of the time at UseWeb.

manager-of-digital-and-data-solutions.title: Manager of Digital and Data Solutions
manager-of-digital-and-data-solutions.abstract: Organize an information system, acquire the fundamental technological and methodological notions allowing the management of an information system, manage a team (management, conducting meetings, recruitment), manage an IT project.

useweb.title: Useweb
useweb.abstract: Develop websites and software solutions for very different clients, in team.

contact.title: You've send mail!
contact.subtitle: If you want to contact me for a new project!
